name: Crane Game (Claw.Games)
description:
Start to play real, live claw machines and crane games on your mobile phone and win real prizes that are shipped directly to you!

With Claw.Games, you can:

- Play real claw games online on your mobile device through live video streaming
- Unlimited moves on all claw machines during gameplay
- Ship prizes directly to you
- Win some of your favorite prizes such as Disney merchandise!
- Become a Bronze membership to access free shipping and exclusive VIP claw machines
- Collect tickets with any gameplay for bigger prizes
- Extended range of bonuses
- Tournaments


! For the best experience, please ensure you are on a high speed internet connection.

! The claw games you play control real mechanical claw machines. These machines can occasionally malfunction. Should you face an issue, please feel free to contact our support team at support@claw.games
